author: fredcrewneck

text: Little bit of trivia- the girl's name is Jakar Malanox. And yeah,she is pretty hot. I also liked Magenta Nuark (?) from Vixen.  She was pretty cute as well.  Crazy how I can remember a lot the names from that game.  It would have been cool if each rider had a stat that was better than others; something that they were "good at", like higher vitality or decreased weapon energy drain in the form  of "efficient weapon use".

author: Ryuk Shinigami

text:
No. Five of the songs in Extreme-G 3, a totally different game, were done by Ministry of Sound. The song on this vid isn't one of them, it's from the original Extreme G (the best), and this is made by some gifted guy at Acclaim. The pic is misleading as it is the cover of XG3. :p

Tip: Use your google fu, esnips, galbadia hotel to find the rest.
